welcomePage.title: CodePro
welcomePage.intro: This page will help familiarize you with CodePro. To get started, read the sections below and click on the related links.
welcomePage.item: Evaluation Guide The CodePro Evaluation Guide provides a step-by-step walkthrough of many of the important features of the product.

Java Best Practice Tools CodePro AnalytiX is a dynamic best practices tool that makes improving Java code quality an integrated part of the development process. CodePro AnalytiX does this by automatically checking hundreds of industry standard rules and metrics as the code is written. CodePro Advisor lowers the TCO of your software by reducing the time and money spent on code reviews, rework, and maintenance.
To audit code, use the Code Auditor CodePro > Views > Audit. To generate metrics, use the Metrics tool CodePro > Views > Metrics. To generate a dependency report, use the Dependency Analyzer CodePro > Views > Dependencies. To schedule various tasks, use the Task Scheduler CodePro > Views > Scheduler.
Learn more To learn more you can browse the CodePro Users Guide.
